channel.title: The ArcheAge Report
channel.description: An English-language podcast for fans of ArcheAge, the MMORPG produced by XLGAMES and published by Trion Worlds.
channel.itunes:author: ArcheAdmin
channel.itunes:summary: An English-language podcast for fans of ArcheAge, the MMORPG produced by XLGAMES and published by Trion Worlds.
channel.itunes:subtitle: An English-language podcast for fans of ArcheAge.

item.title: Episode 16
item.description: Recorded on May 7th. Mark (ArcheAdmin) interviews Phintias, the guy who was incarcerated for ten hours on the ArcheAge Alpha server by players abusing the bot report feature. He also lost his ship and all the trade packages on it! Got questions you want answered? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on May 7th. Mark (ArcheAdmin) interviews Phintias, the guy who was incarcerated for ten hours on the ArcheAge Alpha server by players abusing the bot report feature. He also lost his ship and all the trade packages on it! Got questions you...

item.title: Episode 15
item.description: Recorded on April 21st and 23rd. Mark (ArcheAdmin) interviews Alasondra and Kriptini, both NWO members on the ArcheAge Alpha server. This was before the floodgates opened! Got questions you want answered? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on April 21st and 23rd. Mark (ArcheAdmin) interviews Alasondra and Kriptini, both NWO members on the ArcheAge Alpha server. This was before the floodgates opened! Got questions you want answered? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com.

item.title: Special PAX 2013 Episode
item.description:
Recorded on September 2nd, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) wasn't able to get any Trion Worlds employees to record a podcast with at PAX, but he did find some new MMORPG friends inside the Indie Megabooth! Listen to Above and Beyond Technologies developers talk about their sandbox, The Repopulation!

Seriously though, we don't talk about ArcheAge on this episode. Weird, huh?
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on September 2nd, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) wasn't able to get any Trion Worlds employees to record a podcast with at PAX, but he did find some new MMORPG friends inside the Indie Megabooth! Listen to Above and Beyond Technologies developers...

item.title: Episode 13
item.description: Recorded on July 20th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) apologizes for the long break, then answers more old questions. This time we've got two emails to answer! Got questions of your own? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com. Then Mark talks about the Twitch.tv/ArcheAge channel again, because it's pretty awesome.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on July 20th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) apologizes for the long break, then answers more old questions. This time we've got two emails to answer! Got questions of your own? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com. Then Mark talks about the...

item.title: Episode 12
item.description:
Recorded on July 1st, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) answers some kinda old questions, but they're the only questions we've ever received! Got something you think we can answer? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com. Then Mark talks about the Twitch.tv/ArcheAge channel and what he hopes to accomplish with it.

For more information, follow this link: http://archeagesource.com/topic/1872-twitchtv-archeage-channel-want-to-stream/#entry31076
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on July 1st, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) answers some kinda old questions, but they're the only questions we've ever received! Got something you think we can answer? Email us at contact@archeage-online.com. Then Mark talks about the...

item.title: Episode 11
item.description: Recorded on June 16th, 2013 on ArcheAge-Online.de's "ArcheCast" podcast. This episode is super long! Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks to the German ArcheAge fan community with translation help from Peter (Fido) and Keks. Many E3 questions are asked and answered (in English and German)!
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on June 16th, 2013 on ArcheAge-Online.de's "ArcheCast" podcast. This episode is super long! Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks to the German ArcheAge fan community with translation help from Peter (Fido) and Keks. Many E3 questions are asked...

item.title: Special E3 Episode 2
item.description: Mark (ArcheAdmin) was able to talk to ArcheAge community member Dengar inside the LA Convention Center on the last day of E3. It's a short discussion but interesting nonetheless. So long, and thanks for all the tips!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark (ArcheAdmin) was able to talk to ArcheAge community member Dengar inside the LA Convention Center on the last day of E3. It's a short discussion but interesting nonetheless. So long, and thanks for all the tips!

item.title: Special E3 Episode
item.description: Mark (ArcheAdmin) sits down with Trion's Victoria Voss and Ken Rosman to talk about ArcheAge in North America and Europe. He asks your questions and shows them the 2013 survey results! Victoria and Ken answer the questions as best they can. Stay frosty!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark (ArcheAdmin) sits down with Trion's Victoria Voss and Ken Rosman to talk about ArcheAge in North America and Europe. He asks your questions and shows them the 2013 survey results! Victoria and Ken answer the questions as best they can. Stay frosty!

item.title: Episode 10
item.description:
Recorded on June 1st, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) and Peter (Fido) talk about E3 and the demographics survey (again)! Then they discuss the most recent Korean patch news and pop celebrities being followed by in-game paparazzi!

Please fill out the survey here: http://fluidsurveys.com/s/archeage-online-2013-fan-demographics/
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on June 1st, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) and Peter (Fido) talk about E3 and the demographics survey (again)! Then they discuss the most recent Korean patch news and pop celebrities being followed by in-game paparazzi! Please fill out the survey...

item.title: Episode 9
item.description:
Recorded on May 28th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks about this year's ArcheAge Fan demographics survey and his plans to show the results to Trion at E3. Then Mark rambles on about E3 until he realizes he has nothing important to say. Weird!

Please fill out the survey here: http://fluidsurveys.com/s/archeage-online-2013-fan-demographics/
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on May 28th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks about this year's ArcheAge Fan demographics survey and his plans to show the results to Trion at E3. Then Mark rambles on about E3 until he realizes he has nothing important to say. Weird! Please...

item.title: Episode 8
item.description: Recorded on May 19th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks about the new car mount that's been added to ArcheAge in the last patch (we talked about it once before, but it seems people forgot). Also a good ten minutes of E3 predictions!
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on May 19th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) talks about the new car mount that's been added to ArcheAge in the last patch (we talked about it once before, but it seems people forgot). Also a good ten minutes of E3 predictions!

item.title: Episode 7
item.description: Episode originally recorded on May 6th, but corrupted. I attempted to reconstruct the original recording file over the past week and failed, so here's an apology. Next episode will be better, promise.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode originally recorded on May 6th, but corrupted. I attempted to reconstruct the original recording file over the past week and failed, so here's an apology. Next episode will be better, promise.

item.title: Episode 6
item.description: Recorded on April 29th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) reminds you about the Akhium Man Challenge and E3! There is music throughout this whole episode because it's incredibly short.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on April 29th, 2013. Mark (ArcheAdmin) reminds you about the Akhium Man Challenge and E3! There is music throughout this whole episode because it's incredibly short.

item.title: Episode 5
item.description: Recorded on April 21st, 2013. Fido and Mark (ArcheAdmin) return to talk about Tencent's ArcheAge Closed Beta in China, Japan's "Alpha" tests, steampunk cars, the Akhium Man Challenge and more! Information in this podcast is probably outdated by the time you hear it. There is only music at the beginning and end of this episode.

item.title: Episode 4
item.description: Recorded on April 14th, 2013. Fido and Mark (ArcheAdmin) return to talk more about ArcheAge's red light district, fishing and Trion Worlds' hiring spree. Information in this podcast is probably outdated by the time you hear it. Additionally, we've listened to feedback and only added music at the beginning and end of this episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recorded on April 14th, 2013. Fido and Mark (ArcheAdmin) return to talk more about ArcheAge's red light district, fishing and Trion Worlds' hiring spree. Information in this podcast is probably outdated by the time you hear it. Additionally, we've...

item.title: Episode 3
item.description:
Recorded on April 6th, 2013. We're out of testing and ready to begin regular syndication! Information in this podcast is probably outdated by the time you listen to it. Enjoy the music!

You should be able to find The ArcheAge Report podcast on iTunes within the next few weeks.

item.title: Test Episode 2
item.description: Recorded on March 17th, 2013 with Fido and Mark (ArcheAdmin). Information in this podcast is already outdated. Enjoy the music!

item.title: Test Episode 1
